{"step_by_step_thinking": "A thyroglossal fistula is a type of cyst that forms a tract from the thyroid gland to the skin surface, usually in the midline of the neck. It is an inflammatory lesion that can cause a bulge in the neck. It is not typically precancerous. The lining of a thyroglossal fistula is usually squamous epithelium.", "answer_choice": "A, B, C"}
